sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.sc_ic_Factory</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Entry point for all customisation of the Service Catalog Item Creator script.</description>
        <name>sc_ic_Factory</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var sc_ic_Factory = Class.create();
sc_ic_Factory.prototype = Object.extendsObject(sc_ic_BaseFactory,{
	initialize: function() {
		sc_ic_BaseFactory.prototype.initialize.apply(this,arguments);
		
		/* To use this factory you simply call the registerClass method with the name of the table you want to register it against
		 * and the name of the class that you want to register using the following syntax.
		
		this.registerClass(tableName,class);
		
		* You can register one class against a table.
		*/
	},
	
	type: "sc_ic_Factory"
});

sc_ic_Factory.wrap = function() {
	var fact = new sc_ic_Factory();
	return fact.wrap.apply(fact,arguments);
};

sc_ic_Factory.getWrapperClass = function() {
	var fact = new sc_ic_Factory();
	return fact.getWrapperClass.apply(fact,arguments);
};

sc_ic_Factory.getSecurityManager = function() {
	var fact = new sc_ic_Factory();
	return fact.getSecurityManager.apply(fact,arguments);
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2013-10-29 07:40:11</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0f029814eb3011003623666cd206febc</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>sc_ic_Factory</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">3607b4283cb1311068bcf327dfe37fee</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0f029814eb3011003623666cd206febc</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>nigel.bell</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2014-03-04 08:00:22</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
